short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This project is a research collaboration between MIT, Cambridge and BME, Budapest

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a joint research project between MIT, Network Coding and Reliable Communications Group and BME-AUT. The aim of the project is to use network coding over a lossy channel in a multi-source environment to improve the goodput and reduce latency of the channel.
